name: Homegear::setFamilySetting
description: This method sets a family setting and stores it in the database. Database settings take precedence over the family's settings file.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: The family ID to set the setting for

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the setting. Use lower case characters only.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the setting. Supported types are string, integer and binary.
